results.title: The Expectation
results.brief_description: The youngest and shyest of 12 kids in the family, with high expectations by his father for him to achieve, Enoch reflects on his life, his family and his own future desires.

group.title: Western stories: expressions for the future. Vol. 2

results.title: Discoveries
results.brief_description: Chaos, jealousy, violence, anger and fear - childhood emotions experienced by Angela as she compares her life to the game of soccer. Angela is the soccer ball, her parents the two opposing teams - and no-one is the winner in this game of life, especially Angela. But she is playing her own game now and nothing will stop her - not even Brazil.
results.description: Chaos, jealousy, violence, anger and fear - childhood emotions experienced by Angela as she compares her life to the game of soccer. Angela is the soccer ball, her parents the two opposing teams - and no-one is the winner in this game of life, especially Angela. But she is playing her own game now and nothing will stop her - not even Brazil.
description_for_label: Chaos, jealousy, violence, anger and fear - childhood emotions experienced by Angela as she compares her life to the game of soccer. But she is playing her own game now and nothing will stop her - not even Brazil.

results.title: Dark side beside the river
results.brief_description: The chain reaction of life when one thing leads to another and before you know it you’re on a treadmill of anger, alienation, dislocation and isolation. A personal reflection.

results.title: Silence speaks: digital storytelling project
results.creator_credit: Center for Digital Storytelling US and ACMI
results.brief_description: The content has been created as part of the “Silence Speaks” project, an international movement that provides the survivors of violence and abuse with an opportunity to tell their own stories. A co-production between ACMI and Center for Digital Storytelling (US) to coincide with Real Life on Film. “Silence Speaks” represents the most recent examples of Australian documentary making.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Center for Digital Storytelling US and ACMI
results.description: The content has been created as part of the “Silence Speaks” project, an international movement that provides the survivors of violence and abuse with an opportunity to tell their own stories. results.title: Stripped
results.creator_credit: Center for Digital Storytelling US, ACMI and Dinky
results.brief_description: Emotional put-downs can wreak havoc on you as a person, stripping you of your independence, confidence, your mind, dignity and self-respect. It takes a long time to recover and rebuild your life.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Center for Digital Storytelling US, ACMI and Dinky
